title: Verve Coffee Roasters French Press
preparation_steps: Grind 30 grams of coffee to medium-coarse consistency
Pre-warm French Press with hot water
Add 30g ground coffee to French Press

brewing_steps.instruction: Start timer and pour 480g hot water in slow spiral
Stir gently with wooden spoon to saturate all grounds
Place lid on top, do not press plunger
Press plunger down slowly, pour within 15 seconds

notes: Verve Coffee's French Press method emphasizes sustainability and community. The wooden spoon prevents scratching, while the precise timing and medium-coarse grind create a balanced cup with excellent body and clarity.
